remarks.format: ## Remarks 要傳遞給建構函式，以允許只有下列`dbType`: `Bit`， `BigInt`， `DateTime`， `Decimal`， `Float`， `Int`， `Money`， `Numeric`， `SmallDateTime`， `SmallInt`, `SmallMoney`, `TimeStamp`, `TinyInt`, `UniqueIdentifier`, `Xml`.Only the following are allowed to be passed to the constructor as `dbType`: `Bit`, `BigInt`, `DateTime`, `Decimal`, `Float`, `Int`, `Money`, `Numeric`, `SmallDateTime`, `SmallInt`, `SmallMoney`, `TimeStamp`, `TinyInt`, `UniqueIdentifier`, `Xml`. 以下是預設值指派給`dbType`，端視`SqlDbType`( ， ， ，和屬性會設為`null`):The following are the default values assigned to `dbType`, depending on the `SqlDbType` (the , , , and properties are set to `null`): |SqlDbTypeSqlDbType|最大長度Maximum length|精確度Precision|縮放Scale|地區設定Locale|比較選項Compare options| |---------------|--------------------|---------------|-----------|------------|---------------------| |`Bit`|11|11|00|00|無None| |`BigInt`|88|1919|00|00|無None| |`DateTime`|88|2323|33|00|無None| |`Decimal`|99|1818|00|00|無None| |`Float`|88|5353|00|00|無None| |`Int`|44|1010|00|00|無None| |`Money`|88|1919|44|00|無None| |`Numeric`|99|1818|00|00|無None| |`SmallDateTime`|44|1616|00|00|無None| |`SmallInt`|22|55|00|00|無None| |`SmallMoney`|44|1010|44|00|無None| |`TimeStamp`|88|00|00|00|無None| |`TinyInt`|11|33|00|00|無None| |`UniqueIdentifier`|1616|00|00|00|無None| |`Xml`|最大值 (-1)Max (-1)|00|00|00|IgnoreCase, IgnoreKanaType, IgnoreWidthIgnoreCase, IgnoreKanaType, IgnoreWidth| ## Examples 下列範例會建立新藉由指定資料行名稱和資料行資料類型的物件。`Int`。The following example creates a new object by specifying the column name and a column data type of .`Int`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 要傳遞給建構函式，以允許只有下列`dbType`: `Binary`， `Char`， `Image`， `NChar`， `Ntext`， `NVarChar`， `Text`， `VarBinary`， `VarChar`。Only the following are allowed to be passed to the constructor as `dbType`: `Binary`, `Char`, `Image`, `NChar`, `Ntext`, `NVarChar`, `Text`, `VarBinary`, `VarChar`. 只有`maxLength`規格，或為-1 的允許`dbType`的`Text`， `NText`，或`Image`。Only a `maxLength` specification of , or -1 is allowed for a `dbType` of `Text`, `NText`, or `Image`. 如`dbType`的`Varchar`， `Nvarchar`，或`VarBinary`，長度規格的，或-1，會宣告中繼資料為 varchar （max）、 nvarchar （max） 或 nvarbinary(max)，分別。For a `dbType` of `Varchar`, `Nvarchar`, or `VarBinary`, a length specification of , or -1, declares the metadata as varchar(max), nvarchar(max), or nvarbinary(max), respectively. 以下是預設值指派給`dbType`，端視`SqlDbType`( ， ， ，和屬性會設為`null`):The following are the default values assigned to `dbType`, depending on the `SqlDbType` (the , , , and properties are set to `null`): |SqlDbTypeSqlDbType|精確度Precision|縮放Scale|地區設定Locale|比較選項Compare options| |---------------|---------------|-----------|------------|---------------------| |二元Binary|00|00|00|IgnoreCase, IgnoreKanaType, IgnoreWidthIgnoreCase, IgnoreKanaType, IgnoreWidth| |CharChar|00|00|\<執行緒 >\|IgnoreCase, IgnoreKanaType, IgnoreWidthIgnoreCase, IgnoreKanaType, IgnoreWidth| |ImageImage|00|00|00|無None| |NCharNChar|00|00|\<執行緒 >\|IgnoreCase, IgnoreKanaType, IgnoreWidthIgnoreCase, IgnoreKanaType, IgnoreWidth| |NTextNText|00|00|\<執行緒 >\|IgnoreCase, IgnoreKanaType, IgnoreWidthIgnoreCase, IgnoreKanaType, IgnoreWidth| |NVarCharNVarChar|00|00|\<執行緒 >\|IgnoreCase, IgnoreKanaType, IgnoreWidthIgnoreCase, IgnoreKanaType, IgnoreWidth| |TextText|00|00|\<執行緒 >\|IgnoreCase, IgnoreKanaType, IgnoreWidthIgnoreCase, IgnoreKanaType, IgnoreWidth| |VarBinaryVarBinary|00|00||IgnoreCase, IgnoreKanaType, IgnoreWidthIgnoreCase, IgnoreKanaType, IgnoreWidth| |VarCharVarChar|00|00|\<執行緒 >\|IgnoreCase, IgnoreKanaType, IgnoreWidthIgnoreCase, IgnoreKanaType, IgnoreWidth| ##
